tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: A great human being, a great doctor who is passionately treating her patients and that is not because of money but to give relief to the unwell individuals. In Bangalore, choosing a good medical individual is tough and I met her where People going to have a huge comfort zone and trust. *** ***** ***** ********* *********** ****** *********** She will always guide and instruct for health living with good exercise and good food habit. She gives her patients utmost care and support till recovery. By talking with her, all the stress and overthinking will go off. Kudos to you maam, you are a gem in today‚Äôs society where people thinks about money first and then patients comfort. I respect you a lot and wish you a good luck. Please continue to serve patients like the way you are doing. Thanks a lot. Much appreciated ‚ù§Ô∏è

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Delivered my second baby with her. I really miss meeting her now, that is how much we liked consulting her :) There are so many words to describe her : kind , wonderful, knowledgeable , friendly and so on and so on.. 
Had a second c-section, but my recovery was extremely smooth and very minimal pain (could actually say painless). The next day after surgery was able to do few activities very easily.. God bless her hands!! 
Once you consult her, She really is there for you all the time. I really mean it she responds to our calls and messages every single time without delay. Never seen a doc like that in my life.
I'm extremely grateful to deliver my child with her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have visited Mam first time after my 1st miscarriage and wanted to have a safe and healthy pregnancy. I have read the reviews on Practo and Google and then decided to visit her. Mam has given me confidence on the 1st visit and then we left. We visited her again after a few months once we confirmed the home pregnancy test.She has given me the best possible treatment and guidance throughout the pregnancy and she was very prompt and takes into account all the risk factors . She is on top of everything. She never recommends any test unnecessarily. There was always a positive vibe when we met her. Mine was a high risk pregnancy and she was the saviour . She was also reachable in WhatsApp. She is very very professional and knowledgeable . She was my go to Gynaecologist and will always be. Thanks a lot mam, it was a wonderful journey with you and our lives filled with so much happiness. thank you so much again üôèüôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnant Women Counseling,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Cesarean Delivery,
review:
** ****** ** *** ** *** **** ****** * **** **** **** She helped in delivering my daughter. The condition of my wife was critical, but Dr ensured that She was assisting us at every step with best options available. She devoted a lot of time in counseling my wife and end result was success. I can never thank enough Dr Dhivya for the help she provided. She was there to help on every urgency, sometime late night calls, sometime on whatsapp. But she always replied on time with best advise. She also performed C section for my wife and gave importance guidance even post-delivery.

She was recommended by my friend, and it was the best decision I ever made. She always spends time with the patient, and answers all the questions. My previous doctor was very famous doctor, but she was always in hurry, and was not spending required time/attention. This encouraged me to change the doctor and I am very lucky that I chose Dr Dhivya. IF you really want a doctor who care for you like a family, go for Dr Dhivya.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: We started consulting her from 5 th month of pregnancy as recommended by my brother in law. She was the only friend, gynac available to us during this pandemic. She made sure that we will not be panic and take necessary steps in each trimester.she will always talk to the point  and educated us about each and every medical terms related to pregnancy. I had delivered a beautiful girl child through NVD under her guidance. She explaines every details of scan report so that patients would be aware of the good and bad side. She educated us about low platelet count, Baby latching technique ,Liver function issues while being pregnant, Brest soreness etc. She is readily available for any kind of doubt we faced throughout pregnancy. Such a beautiful person she is. She always pre alerted us about every situation so that we will follow necessary steps in order to avoid the situation.I strongly recommend her for every first time parents if you want a beautiful pregnancy journey  .thank you so much ma‚Äôam

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I consulted Dr. Dhivya for my pregnancy.  I had an excellent pregnancy and childbirth experience under her guidance and care. She explained the care I need to take, advised on the diet and exercises at each stage and was always available when I needed her. Her calm presence and reassuring manner helped me go through my delivery process. She is very knowledgeable, relies on tests and data to make decisions and explains her thought process in detail so that the patient knows what is happening. I would recommend her a 100% to everyone looking for a gynaecologist/obstetrician.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
We approached Dr. Dhivya in third trimester as we chose motherhood hospital for delivery considering my wife's difficult physical situation and the facilities available at the hospital. Dr. Dhivya is a thorough professional, she is very meticulous and guides well. While she is careful in her treatment , she doesn't over-recommend treatment so as to swell the purses of Patient. My wife is currently recovering well from a successful C section..
I recommend her highly for all the above.

Regards
Vinamra

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Gynae advice,Gynaecological Problem,Gynecologic Laparoscopy,
review:
We had an excellent experience with Dr Dhivya Chandrasekar. We consulted her for my second delivery. She is very kind, friendly and patient enough to hear all our queries. She is always available through calls and messages.

She never suggested unnecessary medications. Instead, encouraged me to correct my proper diet and exercises. She motivated us for normal delivery explaining the pros and cons of c-sec.

We had a happy normal delivery and the aftercare was also very good with her. She was very amazing and I would strongly recommend her for having a healthy and happy pregnancy journey üíñ

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Visited Dr Dhivya Chandrasekar for  Pregnancy and Pregnancy Check Up.She listened to all the queries very carefully and guided me with the best available options. Her support was immense when i had covid  ve. She is always available for on phone calls / What's App irrespective of time. She never suggested for unnecessary medications and scannings. Always motivated me for normal delivery by clearing all the doubts and fears on normal delivery. Am ver thankful to her in this regards. She always encouraged me for proper diet and exercise instead of unnecessary medications. Am very thankful to her for healthy baby and normal delivery.I feel she is one of the best gynecologist in Bangalore. I strongly recommend Dr Dhivya if you want safe and beautiful pregnancy journey. Thanks Mam for your caring though out this period.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Scan,Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy care and management,Pregnant Women Counseling,Pregnancy,
review: We had MCDA twins during my wife's first pregnancy. The doctor explained us the consequences and risks properly. Unfortunately the pregnancy didn't go well and we had premature delivery. The babies couldn't survive after 3 months NICU stay. Though the outcome is not something that someone would appreciate, the guidance from the doctor throughout pregnancy was excellent. We consulted her after the incident and before planning again. She educated us well and is guiding us during my wife's second pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor Divya was my doctor during our pregnancy where she helped and guided us throughout the journey. She is very ************** calm and thoughtful. I had high sugar during pregnancy and she constantly monitored it and helped me control it. Also she delivered our baby daughter normally which is great as nowadays all the doctors suggest c section very fast. when I said if normal doesn't happen then she said why will it now happen, we will try for normal only. she was present all the time when i was in labour, patiently giving me strength to deliver. After delivery also she made sure all the tests are properly done and my health is monitored. I am grateful for healthy baby and normal delivery to her and would definitely recommend her to everyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I visited doctor Dhivya for my first pregnancy.  *** *** ******** **** *** *********. Most of my problems were found out by her even before i felt them. During my pregnancy i suffered from covid, mutiple uti, Obstetric cholestasis and she was my guiding angel through the entire phase of it. Coming to delivery and labor. She being my gynecologist during the labor time worked like a miracle for me. I just followed what ever she was guiding me and that helped for my normal delivery :). After the delivery she even personally called me and checked for my well being. Even during my pregnancy she was always available on whatsapp and that itself was a big relief for me.
 I am really glad that I went to doctor Dhivya for my pregnancy. 

Thank you once again Doctor Dhivya for your help and support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: When I was pregnant , was looking for a doctor who is proactive and understand the serious of my pregnancy as I had conceived through IVF . I came to know about Doctor Divya from one of my friend who was also getting treated by Doc Divya itself. After multiple follow up and consultation I realised she had indeed met my expectation. For all regular queries and any health issue I used to send message to Doctor Divya on wats app and she used to respond me without fail . I shall always be grateful to Doctor Divya because despite of having complicated pregnancy, she had helped me to successfully delivered a baby and today I‚Äôm a proud mother of baby girl. Additionally  she counselled me well for my  postpartum depression as well.   Thank you so much !!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Contraception Advice,
review: We are lucky to meet Dr. Dhivya Chandrasekar for our pregnancy consultation. Right from the beginning doctor clearly explained us about the scan reports, medicines, suggested diet and appropriate exercises. She always cleared our doubts patiently. She helped us in all possible ways to make the delivery normal. She's firm not to go for csection until it's really necessary. I'm very thankful to Dr. Dhivya Chandrasekar for her care throughout our pregnancy and childbirth. I will strongly recommend Dr Dhivya for pregnancy care and delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I tak dis immense pleasure to share my experience wit Dr.Divya Chandrashekar.even I choosed her 2 consult her after seeing reviews in practo.after consulting her I was fully satisfied by the way she explained problem and made me confident dat even I too can become mother and today I'm having girl baby dat too had normal delivery.dis everything was made possible because of Dr.Divya.she is very kindly spoken and guided me in my journey of pregnancy.she also guided me about diet so dat I should not increase my weight and taught me about exercises to hav normal delivery. So i would highly recommend Dr.Divya to women who is conscious of diet during pregnancy and who wishes to hav normal delivery. She Is the best Doctor I hav com across thanku so much for ur immense service Dr.I'm very grateful to you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr  Dhivya is one of the most amazing human being I have ever met. I had an instant bond with her in my first visit. My pregnancy was extremely smooth and i had normal delivery despite my fibroids issue. This was all possible because of Dr. Dhivya as she took care of everything and gave a lot of time to me at every stage of my pregnancy and postpartum. I highly recommed Dr. Dhivya as she has a strong inclination for normal delivery and the way she stands with you throughout the good times and bad. .

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review:
We consulted Dr. Dhivya throughout the Pregnancy durations.  She is very professional and skilled Doctor. She takes care of each of your problem seriously and provides the best remedy for it. 
And the good thing that we never waited in clinic/ Hospital before any checkup. She is always on time and very prompt also. 
We decided to go a normal Delivery which is not easy these days considering our lifestyle. But Dr helped us a lot in this regard. Like she suggested to do particular set of exercises, also she did some internal test in hospital 2-3 times, that really started the natural labour pain and everything went well as we expected.

Thank you Dr. again.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Dr Dhivya chandrasekar s so clear about the diagnosis and treatment. I just visited kadubesanahalli clinic for regular follow up and decided to have my delivery in my native place. But after having 2 checkups with Dr dhivya I decided to have my delivery in motherhood only. She is very friendly and  keen diagnosis, all the small symptoms shown in pregnancy are neglected during my first pregnancy was clearly diagnosed this time and treated properly. As she predicted, I had early labor, and she bore all the drama i did during my delivery and made me feel confident and have vaginal birth without epidural. Though I had so many pregnancy complications like low hb, pelvic griddle pain, lft, she took all precautions during my labor, literally made my delivery and post delivery recovery as easy one.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
context: Labor and Delivery,Social Obstetrics and Gynecologist,
review: We  consulted Dr Divya for delivery of our second child. She spent quality time with us clarifying every silly question we had in mind very patiently. She is very dedicated and does not prescribe unnecessary medication. Our first delivery was by C-section and she tried for normal delivery for the second after explaining the risks involved and with her support and gods grace we got our 2nd baby through normal delivery.  She is a very friendly and down to earth person. Didn't mention just for review but she does  followed up with us even when my wife had forgotten an appointment during critical times and even after delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We consulted Dr. Divya during my pregnancy and she really guided and helped us very nicely. She listened to our queries every time and helped us the best way in our journey to parenthood. We were finally blessed with a healthy baby inspite of complications and thanks to her..üòä

review: She is an angel in disguise. She provides utmost care to her patients and is very approachable. She always responds to queries on WhatsApp which is a huge support. She caught my complications at the right time and did a cervical cerclage to ensure my baby became a healthy full term baby. She also gave me constant support when I had to be on bed rest. She is not just an amazing consultant but a highly skilled surgeon. Can't be more grateful to her!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: It was a wonderful experience to share my first pregnancy journey with Doctor Divya Chandrasekhar who always had a beautiful smile on her face. She is very responsive, approachable and above all honest! She never asked us to do any unnecessary scan or test and was very patient in answering all our queries and explained ever step in detail. She is definitely an asset to Motherhood hospital because of her compassion, honesty and dedication that makes her one of the best!

She is an angle from heaven.

review: ** ****** ** ** ******* ** **** ****** **** * ***** ** ***** *** **** *********** **** ******* *********  ** *** ***** **** ** ********* ******* She explained the process, risks, and everything properly without prescribing any unwanted medicines. She is always just a call away and remembers even the minutest details of her patient's history even after months pass by. She is truly a star!
